review:
Unfortunately, I had deposited the wrong financial office through a move.
After several inquiries and requests for answers, I still haven't heard anything.
Just filed a new tax return with a different provider.
Too bad I haven't heard anything about service until today.

Sinnloses Gendergestammel! 
Wer mit der deutschen Sprache nicht korrekt umgehen kann, wird ganz sicher auch nicht verantwortungsvoll mit dem Steuerrecht umgehen. F√ºr mich ein absolutes NoGo!
Sistem generated emails. I sent 10 Emails and the answer was the same, nobody explained what to do! Disappointing!

Scheint wohl bald dicht zu machen. Support antwortet selbst nach einigen Anfragen und Monate langem warten nicht. Steuererkl√§rungen werden komplett falsch gemacht, Telefon Support gibt es nicht.... Blo√ü die Finger davon lassen!

They locked me out of my account by revoking login with AppleID, then support is not answering my repeated requests. However, Taxfix did not forget to charge my bank account, but after taking my money, they ghosted me and now I don't know how to access the data they submitted to Finanzamt on my behalf (hello GDPR). 
Long story short: I do not recommend Taxfix, there are a dozen of other tools to do your Steuererkl√§rung.

Jahrelang die Steuererkl√§rung mit Taxfix gemacht .. mit der App ging es schnell und unkompliziert. Nachdem Update ist die App extrem langsam geworden! Ergebnis f√ºr 2023 .. Ich soll 7,5k an Steuern nachzahlen, obwohl sich meine steuerlichen Daten nur minimal ge√§ndert haben! Ich soll wohl den kostenpflichtigen Support in Anspruch nehmen.. alles klar, ich mache meine Steuererkl√§rung jetzt woanders und erhalte wieder meine √ºbliche R√úCKZAHLUNG!

Habe drei Jahre in Folge meine Steuererkl√§rung mit Taxfix gemacht und bisher keine Probleme. Nach dem Update ist jedoch alles anders, ich kann zur Identit√§tsbest√§tigung kein Dokument mehr hochladen und bekomme seit 7 Tagen keine Hilfe - weder √ºber den Kundensupport, noch √ºber Facebook, noch telefonisch, da die Rufnummer au√üer Betrieb ist. Keine Ahnung, was da schief l√§uft, aber so verprellt man sich erfolgreich langj√§hrige Kunden. Schade!
Nachtrag: √úber's Handy hat es jetzt doch noch geklappt, allerdings wurde ich damit v√∂llig alleine gelassen.

mache seit 5 Jahren meine Steuererkl√§rung mit Taxfix. Jedes Jahr hat die vorausgesagt R√ºckzahlung gestimmt. 
habe gerade die Steuererkl√§rung f√ºr '23 abgeschickt und bin gespannt ob die voraussichtliche Erstattung diesmal auch stimmt. Wenn ja w√§re es der Wahnsinn

Ich habe 02/2023 meine Daten eingegeben u warte bis Heute 06/2023 auf das Geld vom Finanzamt, h√§tte ich das gewu√üt w√§re ich direkt hingegangen ausrechnen lassen oder zur LoHi gegangen, aber Hauptsache Werbung machen im Fernsehen, schnelle einfache Hilfe, was verstehen sie darunter? Sagen sie doch gleich wie lange der Mist dauert u was wir an ihre Firma abdr√ºcken d√ºrfen, sowie ich manche Komentare lese bekommt der eine oder andere nichts vom Finanzamt sowie sie das ausgerechnet haben sondern m√ºssen bezahlen. Was l√§uft hier bitte falsch? Wenn man sie per Nachricht hier bei Facebook anschreibt kommt keine Reaktion, anscheinend wie beim Amt um eine gewisse Zeit niemand erreichbar. Ich werde ihre Seite auf keinen Fall weiter empfehlen, sauhaufen.
Super einfach, keine halbe Stunde und zack war es fertig ‚úÖ
Anschreiben an den Support seit 14 Tagen keine Antwort bekommen.

Vern√ºnftige steuererkl√§rung machen bzw keine Sachen versprechen die so oder so nicht eingehalten werden.. zum Beispiel: 
Die 50% Sofort-Auszahlung.
Absoluter Bl√∂dsinn..
Man bekommt auch keinerlei Antwort von euch auch wenn ich meine Steuer 2022 von euch machen lassen wollte mach ich das lieber selbst.. wer zu erst kommt... 
Wie kann man so ein Unternehm an die Wand fahren.. ganz miese Nummer

Ich war immer sehr zufrieden mit Taxfix, ich hatte die letzten drei Jahre keinerlei Probleme.
Nun habe ich vor mehr als zwei Wochen die Erkl√§rung in der App bzw. am PC ausgef√ºllt und sie wird seitdem ‚Äúautomatisch √ºberpr√ºft ‚Äú, Bearbeitungszeit laut Taxfix 2-3 Tage. 
Auf meine Nachfrage per Mail - eine Telefon-Hotline scheint es nicht zu geben -, kam eine automatische Antwortmail ohne konkreten Hinweis, wann denn meine Steuererkl√§rung endlich √ºbermittelt wird. 
Ich bin ziemlich entt√§uscht und w√ºrde aus diesem Grund Taxfix nicht (mehr) empfehlen.
Gibt deutlich bessere M√∂glichkeiten, die kostenlos sind
50 % Sofort Erstattung ist nur ein Werbe Versprechen..... Leider

einmal und nie wieder.
laut taxfix Berechnung, sollten etwas √ºber 200 ‚Ç¨ zur√ºckgezahlt werden.
laut dem darauffolgenden steuerbescheid, darf ich nun aber √ºber 400 ‚Ç¨ nachzahlen.
Berechnung nach bestem Wissen und Gewissen hin oder her, eine Differenz von √ºber 600 ‚Ç¨. darf nicht passieren.
von mir definitiv keine Empfehlung.
das ist mir mit einem anderen steuerprogramm noch nie passiert. da ist die Berechnung nicht mal um ein paar Cent abgewichen.
Nein bis heute nichts erhalten Dauert ewig lang von Wegen am n√§chsten Tag die H√§lfte ihr solltet echt nicht solche Werbung schalten ! Ich schau mich sicher nach was anderem um ! mfg

Ich war offen und dachte mir ich probiere Taxfix mal aus...
Es ist kinderleicht aufgebaut man wird alles abgefragt. Easy dachte ich mir.
Mir wurde ausgerechnet, dass ich angeblich 90 Euro zur√ºck bekommen w√ºrde. Tut mir leid, aber da mache ich meine Steuer lieber in Papierform und bekomme meine 700 zur√ºck.
ich kann taxfix nur empfehlen...

Die sch√§tzen 900 Euro R√ºckerstattung, ich krieg nichts vom Finanzamt. Ich schreibe dem Support und die schicken mir mehrfach irgendwelche unn√∂tigen Copy Paste Antworten, die null weiterbringen. Ich wi

Der Betrag stimmt nie im Leben‚Ä¶ Nimmt ihr mehr als die H√§lfte von dem Steuergeld oder was macht ihr ? Das erste mal Taxfix genutzt und entt√§uscht wurden, wie viele andere in den Bewertungen. Erstes mal und nie wieder, kann ich nicht empfehlen.

Ich f√ºhle mich dezent ver√§ppelt. 
Ich habe so wie immer meine Steuer √ºber Taxfix gemacht. Dieses Jahr habe ich zum ersten Mal eine Nachricht bekommen, dass ich Dinge √ºberarbeiten muss. Habe mir die besagten Zeilen nochmals angeschaut und festgestellt, dass alles korrekt war. Ergo habe ich nichts ver√§ndert und meine Bescheide unver√§ndert nochmals √ºbersandt. Jetzt wurden aber pl√∂tzlich aus anf√§nglich berechneten 1212,69‚Ç¨, obwohl nichts ver√§ndert wurde, 727,75‚Ç¨ neu berechnet. Wie kann das bitte sein?! - Nunja, jetzt bleibt nur noch warten und sehen. Finde ich pers√∂nlich nur √§u√üerst fragw√ºrdig. Aus diesem Grund werde ich mich f√ºr meine n√§chste Steuer auch anderweitig umsehen und das Programm nicht mehr unterst√ºtzen.
Meines Erachtens einfach nur sehr unprofessionell.

Katastrophe in der Handhabung. Warum mu√ü ich mich danach noch extra bei Elster registrieren lassen? Um mich dann noch einmal bei Taxfix zu legitimieren? Steuererkl√§rung im Februar gemacht und noch keinen Bescheid erhalten. Nie wieder!

Taxfix Deutschland Ich musste mich registrieren. Wenn ihr das nicht mal wisst, tut es mir leid. Ums Geld tut es mir eh leid. Es ging um die Berechtigung auf einen Zugriff. Ich hoffe nur, dass hier mal langsam was passiert. Euren Support ben√∂tige ich nicht. Der meldet sich eh nicht zur√ºck. Habe ich letztes Jahr schon mal angefragt. Danke f√ºr nix.
Mega einfaches Programm! Schnelle Bearbeitung und fast genaue Berechnung der Erstattung oder Nachzahlung! Definitiv weiterzuempfehlen !!!!!! Love it

Absolut nicht zu empfehlen. Mir wurde gesagt, dass das Finanzamt mir etwa 200 Euro erstatten w√ºrde, stattdessen erhielt ich heute die Best√§tigung, dass ich mehr als 400 Euro an das Finanzamt zahlen muss

I have used this app for years now.but this year the UI was exceptionally troublesome. Could not skip questions to come back and answer them, attachment won't upload as UI kept refreshing, when tried to change answer and resave ; new answer was not saved at all. When finally I got tired and opened the web version , found out the app and web version are not synced. Somehow after many to and fros with my consultant we managed the process but it was painful.

I've used Taxfix for 3 years now. The new layout is very rigid and not user friendly. We used to be able to skip questions to answer them later, and navigate back and forth to other questions. Now we have to answer all questions in a strict order, which forces me to put in false information just to move forward if I don't have tue correct information handy. Going back to resolve the questions later is very difficult and confusing with this new platform design. somehow the platform erased my data

2024 update: in the last two years the app degraded significantly: - software is very buggy and no helpful error messages - I had either to debug the app myself to get a clue or write emails to get problems resolved. Example of bugs - files do not upload, identification fails, changing previous answers doesn't change the next step questions - most questions do not have explanations - web version supports only 20% of functionality - last year the app was extremely sluggish Won't use it anymore

I really like TaxFix. If I could only complete my entry. I'm stuck on "Ausgaben" and cannot move on from "Weitere Enegetische Masnamen", I don't get to the very bottom and cannot click "none" and move on, it's like I can't get to the last line. Quite frustrating and not device dependent, I've tried multiple. I just want to finish my entry and send in... And no, support is not available, they are overloaded. Hopefully the app isn't forever broken

A nice app, much cheaper than an accountant or the fee for support through an association and just as easy. The only thing that's annoying about taxes now is to gather all the documents. It is what it is... ;) Usually you can get a few hundred Euros back if you keep all your receipts, so it's worth it. However, more information could be provided and the English version needs the technical German terms additionally, to find it on the German documents.

The customer service is fantastic! It is a nice application but unfortunately some existing features disappeared and that is very confusing for the user. Before when you submitted it was still possible to shortly add something. Now not anymore. You should hint this very clearly to the user. I realized now shortly that a data was missed but I cannot edit my application. Also you can fill the data only sequentially now which does not make sense at all. The regular mandatory app update is not nice.

Really helpful and easy to understand, if it can be filled out at once. Has some major usability and UX problems. If a user puts a question on ToDo, it can be hard to understand it later, because the Q often refers to the previous one and you are not able to see what it was. The user identifies himself by "upload a DOCUMENT" /taking a pic of it. Uploaded a perfect pdf, but didnt accept it. Accepted only pictures. Frustrating! I have contacted support, no help from there.

It's good and easy, if you do it at once. But I noticed I didn't have all the answers yet, and wanted to continue another time, but this was not so easy. You can't really go back to the beginning and go over it again and also check all the answers youve made so far. Because my missings numbers were in between, not from a certain point forward. Better to just stop filing where you can't continue so you can just continue everything there next time. Also view after, has no possibility to adjust:-(

BE CAREFUL BY USING THIS APP! They misinform and misdirect. During the tax return process, the app shows that I might receive over 200‚Ç¨ but I had to pay the fee of 79,98‚Ç¨. When I paid, the refund information changed to 0‚Ç¨! Also, the app asked me if I ever did a tax return for the years that I do the tax return. I click the yes option and continue. My Tax office just informed me that it is also not possible to do a tax return for those years. They took my money for no reason.

App UI is wonky at best. ID and document recognition doesn't work & was only accepted after being checked by a human, waiting over a month for the feedback of their so called "expert" and it turns out they cannot help because it falls under the long long list of exceptions. Funny that I discussed the case with the employee that checked my documents at the start of the process. After many disappointments and bad service I'm done. Off to a more reliable in-person service provider it is then.

Extremely useful application. The interface is intuitive and easy to use. The questions asked to gather information for filling the tax return are easily understandable. The possibility of having the interface in English is so far the best feature for me. Saves me a lot of time! Customer support is also pretty active. Already recommending Taxfix to my friends! Thanks for this wonderful application.

I tried filling out my tax documents for Germany on my own but the process was way too confusing. This app was really easy and quick to use in order to submit my tax docs and get a refund! The only downside is that I had to click 'no' to way too many options that didn't apply to me. But other than that I recommend, especially if you're not a German speaker/familiar with the filing process.

Very good app. Easy to use and walks you through all the tricky parts when you do your taxes. Not so sure about a few translations in some places and more examples would be nice. Also, the option to upload pdf files should be there. A lot of companies send payslips digitally now. But for an early stage app already very impressive!

Terrible application that gives a lot of headache. 1. It's super slow. You need to wait for a few minutes to upload each of the page, especially from phone 2. If you want to change something, after the change they scroll till the bottom right away and you always need to go up to keep changing/checking 3. But the worst part - their "miscommunication" about January, 2nd deadline! Which could lead to a huge loss for me, thanks to Wundertax that didn't lie about the true deadline and saved me

Edit Update 2022: The app is immensely improved compared to last year's. The process was easy and intuitive and took a total of exactly 1 hr. ++: the addition of German terms to the insurance part, these could be more visible. Please add to other parts too! The bad: date pickers, in English, are US standard (mm/dd/yyyy), but in the end they are European standard. Inconsistent. The very bad: in child section, variables didn't catch and display as {name} and {year}. I can email Screenshots.

First time used and didn't find it as comfortable as steurgo. For any small change, you have to go back all the way. After getting payment mandate they ask for documents. And comes the info that they need 3 days to evaluate and upload to tax office. Steurgo submits immediately. So if you are trying on the last day of submission don't use this platform. They are not honest/transparent with the flow before the payment mandate. Will update review after getting refund if any as shown.

I've used Taxfix appast year and my user experience was great. Now app is terrible, after answering each question it takes the app at least 3-4 min to save my answer and go to the next question. This means that filling in one section of questions takes 30-40 minutes. And last stage with personal data gathering simply doesn't work. Extremely disappointed.

The app has some technical problems. ( I.e. I struggled when inserting the number of interviews I have done in a year as I typed 30 instead of 3 and had to click a random answer >100 times just to finish my application as changing that number didn't update the rest of the form) Besides this small issue, the customer service was great and I received my tax return in very little time. Good Job!

So far, a very pleasant and clear overview and experience while filling all the data. The required information is quite accurate so I highly recommend filling it in as one goes through the year, or keeping close tabs on all details. Also, make sure to plan in a suitable amount of time to complete the form, as loading times after every single input seems to be a bit slow as well.

I tried my hand on this, but perhaps being an older millennial plays a part in this, but I prefer the UI of a proper desktop-sized application and WISO has been always very reliable and pretty close to perfect. The reviews and costs didn't entice me either, judging by the reviews here. It was a nice experiment, but it simply didn't feel as W well-structured or performant as other solutions.

Nice app (also with the website), makes tax declaration very simple, step by step questions and detailed explanations for each question. Provides accurate estimations on refund. I am using it since 3 years. BUT BE CAREFUL! if you are using the web app. I started to fill out a year and logout in the middle (bec. need to gather additional documents) ALL YOUR PROGRESS gets LOST, literally GONE and you need to start-over. Support/Contact by Email button on web site open only a blank Tab in Browser!?

The application is clearly a trash. The company needs to hire better project managers who know what features people appreciate. The app carries forward data from one year to next, and doesn't allow you to change it or start from beginning. Unnecessary UI animations coupled with hogh load times, makes it a complete garbage. I'm sorry if it sounds too harsh, but I'm a dev myself and I know what is good or bad tech implementation. Majority of time, it's stupid PMs with no vision at all.

I didn't receive any return. Instead I received a letter that I need to pay a tax difference to the finanzamt. Another thing is that you scan your documents and there is no recognition of words. The help menus and the categories are not clear enough some times and the categories could lead to confusion. I also received a message saying that the amount I had paid annually for health insurance was too much but it was the correct amount (it's not like a was earning 100k). A lot to improve...

Availed the tax advisor option, money paid(129.99euros). I uploaded my ID for verification ten times with different IDs and the app is still stuck at asking me to upload everytime I open. I cannot even get in touch with my tax advisor to update some information and add my partners documents. I tried sending chats but it says couldn't send. I have contacted them on every platform but no response at all. I have also sent my ID through the emails.

Being an expat, I find it a real difficult to deal with the taxations, as I was not completely aware of the official work. It was never going to be that easy without Taxfix. I sincerely extend my thanks to the whole team for being so supportive from the very beginning of the process. I would highly recommend this application for it's reliability. The only thing I had to do was filling some basic informations about daily wages, uploading my yearly payment slip. Taxfix does everything after that!!

It is really so easy! Just answer questions fitting your family and financial situation and the app guides you thru. Full upload of data available in the finance office. Immediate submission. Fast and clear support. English or Deutsch. Taxes really cannot be a great experience by default, but an easy one - now they can!

Very hard to fill if you do not know what will be next question so it is best to try to fill it, erase everything and go from start. Scanner for Lohnsteuerbescheinigung does not work. If you upload same pdf 3 times, every time it reads different results. 10% of values were read correctly. Anyway, a lot of manual work. Definitely not worth the money.

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖNever Recommended, Worst Experience Ever‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ They have 2 payment options and one of them is 39 euros and the other one is 35 euros + 10% of total refund, which is insane! suppose someone has a tax refund of 2000 euros so they are gonna charge the person 200 euros + 35 euros!!!! just for extra 4 euros!... even they don't clarify the explanation about this while selecting the payment method. Even they did not help at all when I contacted them. So I don't want anyone to get into their trap!!!!!!

Even when you don't get any tax returns, you still have to pay 40‚Ç¨... A Money hungry, phony, insincere company that creates false advertisements to lure in and ripoff customers. It's the absolute worst app ever!!! Even the user experience is horrible. The app is very slow, laggy, really clunky, and buggy. Their customer service is severely lacking. It's my own fault that I ever fell for such deceptive and misleading advertisements but never again!!! I would never recommend "Taxfix" to anyone.

This app is unbelievably slow and laggy: After every input, it freezes for 10 seconds until it confirms the input. Then it spends another 10 seconds uploading the answer and another 10 seconds to load the next screen. I only wanted to answer the questions regarding my workplace and lost about 20% of battery until I was finished.

The app is freezing even that I have Huawei Mate 20 Pro and the app is crashing afterwards. . Especially on "work" section, it keeps giving me "work places" even that I am answering no it keeps giving me the same question again and again, it arrived to number 44 and can go forever :( I tried logging in from the pc browser weirdly it freezes as well!! Never happened with me in any other website or app.. It will be great if there is a solution as I didn't find any other English reliable app

App has become extremely slow that I am unable to use it anymore. Even the drop-down for selecting gender doesn't open for submitting my details for filing. Changing the rating from 5 to 1 star now. App keeps on freezing. Also the price for joint tax filing is 59.99 euro? Whereas the same service in Steuergo is just 35 euro.

Such a slow and u reliable app. I've used it last two years despite its extraordinary slowness. This year, they even caused me to miss the deadline as I've decided to use their advisory service. However when I've filled everything in a long time (yes the app is so slow), they started to reject my identification document with a generic reason. I've written several emails to their support. They've only responded once with a generic message. They've not responded to my inquiries inquiries at all.

the UX seems good at first and the UI is appealing. But the service doesn't seem optimal for the end user, because it doesn't offer tips on how to improve your refund as done by other online services I have used in the past. This service charges a static amount when you have a refund, but it doesn't charge in case you have to return an excess.. or it charges someone else and probably more, which may mean their interest may be towards another bigger end user

It's really waste of time , I submitted my documents and details 2 months before and I have chosen the expert option.After that I haven't received any single update from them. I tried to contact the support but always ended up with their automated message. I'm done with this.... Literally sucking our time.

Terrible service, would recommend to just use a regular real life tax advisor. I paid more for their service and waited for over a month for my tax return to be generated. The customer service offered me a ‚Ç¨10 discount for the NEXT tax return I submit through them! What a joke! I highly recommend you look for other options to save you money and time.

If there are issues, they will drag time until the tax office processes the documents and they can get their money. They are are not willing to help to recall the declaration back, fix it and send it again. They don't think clients could bring them money if they help them (clients who never leave, are main source of revenue). Now, I will never use them advise against it.

App is unbelievable slow - took over 10 min to log in - had to deinstall and install again- now it alreasy takes this app 5 min to only loading the start screen Now "already got an acc? Log in!" "Yes please!" "Enter mail... sending 6 digit Code, check your mail" Within the 10 seconds of open the gmail - the taxfix Startseite from Zero "Already Got an acc? Log in!!" Youtube commercials where like "within 5 min" Where? When? Been 2 hours and I can't Log back in!!!!!! You need an extra device !!!

I used the app to submit the tax with tax advisor, however after filling all nessesary sections, one of the sections just stuck. As a result I can not finish to submit my data and it is not possible to submit my tax report. Support can not solve the issue during 8 days, very dissapointing.

Great tool! I never thought I would be able to file my taxes in Germany alone. The Taxfix interface is so user friendly and they explain everything while filing your taxes is very simple and easy to understand manner. You can use it on both app and desktop. It is also fully in English! Highly recommend!

Very easy to follow the instructions and very supportive. Although, I'm setting here 4 starts for two reasons. Firstly some questions are translated straight from German to English and its meaning gets confusing. E.g: Did you have kids in 2022? Does it mean you have kids or you have a newborn? Secondly, talking to the advisor is super complex. Most of the times you don't need talking to the advisor, but when you do you have a hard time talking to a chatbot.

Not sure it's worth it - Taxfix said I would get significantly less back than when I did it the proper way (Elster Form), Tax fix estimated less than half of what the official forms estimated. Plus theres a fee to use tax fix. I've decided not to use tax fix
For some reason 50% referral discount was not applied. The apps response a bit slow and take few hours to complete the tax return for the first time.

Totall trash, fill declration . and was some documents missing which Taxfix didnt informed , couldnt change afterwards . ends up i have toi do all again manually alon.of course no chance to refund for wrongly sended declaration

I used the tax refund with expert service, there were no update on my application for 2 months, I tried to contact them many times but no response, so I ended up canceling my application and deleting my account, but I was surprised that they have deducted 520‚Ç¨ from my bank accound for no reason !!!, my application is still in progress with another tax advisor I didnt even receive any refund from the tax office yet!!

Not a good experience. Once submitted the questionnaire can't be edited, there's no way to ask the "premium tax consultant" for clarifications on the tax return, and they never reply to support emails (it's been 2 weeks).

It is a good app for expats with no or limited experience about tax filing in Germany. But it would be super helpful if the app gives an illustration about the final tax report and why this amount of money would be refunded or required to be paid.

Once you click "with tax advisor", there is no way back. I'm blocked for this year because the ID verification is impossible without a german ID, I tried 10 times with different papers and was always rejected
I love it. So easy and until now, all years with great results

They charge you more than they'll give you and they take the money from your account sooner than they'll give money and still I haven't got any money but so far they deducted money from my account automatically. Bad result Not recommended to anybody if I could've give zero I would

Horrible experience with the tax advisor service. They've repeatedly rejected my identification documents as "blurry" even though I've provided them high-res images directly from a scanner (app doesn't allow PDFs). Non-existent support, nobody answered my emails even after weeks of waiting. I cannot recommend their services, it's a complete waste of time and they don't seem to be serious about customer care. The application is slow and full of bugs, very frustrating to use. Waste of time.

So so - somewhat easy, just like for other software or apps, though the Lohnsteuer scan didn't work well. No real explanations so I had to Google to not guess. Overall, not very transparent and I had to search for the actual return. App made a mistake on the return (applied deductible for married couples instead of single, though I entered it correctly). If you speak German, there are better apps that are more clear and easier to use. The customer service is courteous and helpful though.

The app is in principle awesome! BUT.. it is incredbly slow, it takes almost 10 seconds to move between every question!!! or screen. This enormously slows down the experience, and creates a lot of frustration. I see no reason why this should be slow, please fix, üòå.

Very bad service! Started with no tax advisor option it showed me that I might get returns up to a certain amount I switched to the option with tax advisor filled all the information needed uploaded all the documents, since I have a special case & paid ‚Ç¨129,99 I went to the web interface & surprise! it switched back to a regular submission not a submission with a tax advisor, and showed totally wrong numbers, not what I filled in! 3 days & support didn't reply yet, thieves stole my money üí∏
It is really good application, and a life saver for English speakers in Germany, however I think the service cost could be a bit cheaper

I had a bad experience for the last two year with this app. 2018 tax process was smooth &finalized in 8 weeks. But I am waiting since 6 months for simple tax return. I already asked to Taxfix support. They sent me chat bot answer which can be find easily on internet. In 2020 , a few hundres euros home office allowance should be available. But it is not an option . Only choosing number of home office days not enough to get this. Support and options/questions in app needs to be improved.
This is the most helpful aid I have ever used to do my tax return. It is like having a conversation with a very good friend.
Best application for tax submission. Everything thing is clearly described and explained. Topp üëå
The entire process was simple and seemless.

I started to fill application for tax return but their offer was too low. 300‚Ç¨ less than another app offered me. For that I didn't accept their offer. Later they charged me 143‚Ç¨ because I didn't cancelled my application in 14 days. They hide after "Terms and conditions" to charge you for doing nothing.

It's has a sleek design. But it's so slow that filing taxes via the app is almost impossible. Their process is also almost linear and rigid and is designed almost exclusively for full time employees. Wouldn't recommend this for students and freelancers. I also didn't like the platform forcing me to use their buggy app. Uploading via mobile is a mess. I prefer filing my taxes via web.

First off, this app is totally useless in Germany. The tax office uses it's own system, online for people to file taxes. I used Taxfix twice. Both times i was charged by Taxfix saying that I would get money back. Both times, I had to pay additional taxes in excess of ‚Ç¨500. I did not even get the fee back from Taxfix. Seems like a scam to me.

There's critical bugs in the android app and the web version lacks some features. I can't fill in my Freischaltcode because the input field doesn't activate the keyboard on the screen and the support doesn't answer. I will do my next declarations on other platform.

The app itself is good, I just had some lags a few times and a couple of times it got stuck on the same question, but nothing major it has some wonderful features like the scan from picture of the Lohnsteuerbescheinigung which worked perfectly, all the fields contained the exact amount stated on the document. As concerns the tax refund experience itself it was very good. Simple, questions to the point, easy to use, logical. By far the best tax refund app I tried.

Awesome app!! It makes the whole tax declaration way easier to do. And although I was quite skeptical at first, I really received their calculatated amounts from the Finanzamt! And they don't charge you anything if you're are getting less than 50‚Ç¨ back, which is quite nice! I do recommend it! 10 out of 10!

I can recommend this app. It's really intuitive, with tips while responding to the questions. But the many questions are about general and there may be some things that you would want to mention to get some taxes back, but sometimes you have to think in which category to mention it. Anyway, it's a good app, I'm satisfied.

The App is easy to use but it is buggy as hell. You guys need to fix some bugs asap. Somehow the app can't save my changes for the language. I always have to change language when I open the app. Sometimes the screen will just freeze! It's really annoying. I'm using last android version

Update - this is just a waste of time - neither Android App nor Web Based app works. Being constantly asked for screenshots with no clear resolution in sight. Worked fine last years, really good service. But this year new SSO just does not works for me. Endless loop to login, directed to browser. Fix it Tax fix

It took long waiting time (more than a week) for them do deliver your documents after I summited. Therefore I missed the deadline of tax declaration. Be aware of this ‚Äúservice‚Äù, it may bring you trouble. [Update] Even one star is way too much! Due to their delay, I took an other paid software for dax declaration and made it done within one hour. They did not agree my withdraw but still delivered my document (of course the submission time was late). Now there are two of my tax declarations.

The "do it yourself" might be helpful for people who work 9-5 jobs but a headache for people in shift work or aviation. I gave up and asked for a advisor..biggest mistake. I got half of what I normally get and there was zero communication. I don't know if the tax advisor even looked at the data I sent for shift work, layovers etc. very disappointed and do not recommend to get a tax advisor in the app. You will be throwing your money away for absolutely no help at all. Lesson learned.

I have been using the app for 5 years and I was happy. But the app has never been so slow and laggy like now! I cannot finish any section without so much waiting ro crash. I am changing my rating and now have to consider alternatives since I don't want to spend sooo much time on this work!

I think it's a nice app and way faster, but if ever you are not so sure about your entry with the informations you need to fill up, it's better if you see a berater in which you will just give your lohnsteuerbescheinigung and they will do all the work. If you make mistakes in your entry it's a lot of job and very complicated, especially if you don't speak much Deutsch.

I've applied and waited for about 2 months and I didn't get any amount. I wasted 40‚Ç¨. They showed after calculating about 4k ‚Ç¨ possibility but in the app after two months they showed that it's been calculated 2 euros and some cents. It's really cheated me. I'm disappointed, not going to recommend anyone anymore.

So far seems great. Did my income taxes for 2018 in Germany in about 20-30 minutes. However it did not ask about any "Au√üergew√∂hnliche Belastungen" which occured to me at the end of the process. Also, the English terms did confuse me at times when comparing to the German documents.h it'd be good to have both languages displayed for some of the more technical/specific terms. Overall great experience though. Hope the processing is smooth.

Up until this year everything was great so I decided to give them credit and try this new feature they've introduced called Tax with Advisors. Turns out the advisors are pretty much sneaky and put your request on a pile where they won't look until your 14 days of return have been expired. Once you cannot rollback, they'll do an incredible bad job with your tax declaration and you cannot do anything about it because Taxfix DO NOT ANSWER their support cases. My friends and I are all stuck now!

had worst experience than previous year while fling tax return. this year app is horribly slow. for each answer I have to wait several seconds, sometimes minutes. lot of scope for improvement. I guess developers had changed the logic and probably heavy computations happening in background. nevertheless customer experience is not good now.

Yes, this is the fourth year I have used this app. I can't imagine filing taxes without it. The application is super modern, easy to use and in English. If you are not sure about a question, there are also explanations. Even the normal person can be a tax expert with this application. I only used the customer service once when I first started using it and they were nice with a quick response. KEEP GOING TAXFIX :-)

Customer friendly I have tried last year and I got what was expexted interms of tax refund. I have expexted that I can recal some or many of my personal information when filing my tax this year, however, this was not the case. The system was crashed and became very slow at some moments but the data I filled were not lost. Customer service took several days to get back to me. Overall, I am satisfied with the app and the result comming out of it.

I love this App!!! It saves me so much time. And the price is right for the service you get. I am using it for the 2nd time in 2020 I did a Tax for the previous 4 years 2016-2019 I got a lot of money back and today I did my tax for 2020. It is really really really easy, fast and effective. And the best part is you can reduce your tax by adding the cost of tax software you are using. Beautiful a self sustainable service. Excellent work Taxfix Team. Make sure to improve it.

Blown away by how much more I got back (almost double) compared to previous years using a different app. At first I was surprised by how many questions I had to go through, but at the end, all those detailed questions were what made the difference! Without the incredibly spot-on questions, I would've reported less. I will definitely tell all my friends, and use it again for the upcoming years. Thank you, Taxfix <3

So, as an average Joe, i was terrified of providing a tax return in Germany. Even in my own country it's a nightmare, let alone as an expat with basically 0 German language knowledge. Boy i was happy with this app. Not only it was in English, but they guide you by the hand, question by question. And when you're not sure what the question means, there is "?" which explains the question in length. Super easy, super happy!

If I cold give 0 star i would have given them . I have to pay already a lot of money from my monthly pay , now with the app , it say that I have to pay more money , even if I have changed my living place , I have a lot of expenses that I've sent to the app for the 100th time . I had the option with the expert . Dont use the app , just go to a physical person that can really help you !
Worst service by taxfix. Tax advisor kept my file for more than two months with no feedback. Dont waste your time with taxfix.

This app is absolutely fantastic! It was incredibly easy to file my tax returns with this app. They have a highly convenient end-to-end process where all you have to do is fill in the necessary details in the app, make the payment, and then simply wait to receive the money (if applicable) that you're entitled to receive from the tax office. Zero hassle. Also, their fees are very reasonable and their prediction about the amount I'll will receive was spot on! I definitely recommend this app.
Is a wonderful and practical app to file taxes,as up-to-date information is there to help me with every query of mine.
I work in cook Indian restaurant. But this facility is very good which is available in English. We are very happy with this because here we do not know the language and there is no one to support us.

Easy to use and asks the right questions. I haven't received my declaration yet so I'm curious to see if the return will be as large as predicted. But even if it's not, the app is way simpler than the elster stuff so I'd recommend it even at the cost. Edit: for the third year in a row I've had a lovely tax return. I love taxfix for its user-friendly surface and the hours I save on my tax declaration. THANK YOU! Update 2024-using it again, it's only getting better. ‚ù§Ô∏è
I tried Wiso before, it seemed like no end to it. taxFix made it easy and ended the frustration. Recommend it.

Awful app. Had to submit my ID many times but it wouldn't work. Eventually is fixed itself days later. I paid for the more expensive advisory service and yet after 1.5 months they still ask me to be patient because they're overloaded and cannot complete my tax return. No option to ask your adviser questions and when I leave questions in comments they go unanswered. Steer clear ! Update: even though I was asked to contact support for help I still have no answer! Awful customer service.

App works that's why 1 star, but it hangs multiple times is very very slow. Have to restart 10 times to do one tax filing once a year. It took 2 hours to do the foling for 2023 and acter spending 2 hours i have to pay 40 euros. App used to work before but now using it burns more time than saving. Also after adding cost for work literature refund goes down which is weird. Would strongly encourage people to consider manual submission instead of burning time and money both.
I applied for tax refund last year (for 2022) and I still didn't get refund. Terrible experience üò°

Love this app. It's easy and uncomplicated and you can do it at home anytime you want. You can save alot of time and stress. Also I love the presavings, you did once, the next time alot of your answers are already put in automatically, making it even easier to fill in the informations. Definitely recommend to anyone who wants a fast and easy way to return your taxes.

Super usefull app but there is a really big problem with the technical performance. Just sign-in process takes ages! Had to wait almost a minute to see the key pad to enter my pin. Hope this performance problem can be solved soon.

I used taxfix to fill my taxes last year and it was great. This year the app is extremely slow. Also, I would prefer an app that I can see my answers to the questions instead of a single pdf file at the end. Tax office asks some proofs and I have to spend so much time to figure out how an amount stated in a specific section of that pdf file generated. I probably use a different app next year

Pathetic app with a ridiculous UI! When I tried to upload my Lohnsteuerbescheinigung (because I have it from previous years) as PDF, the app got stuck, wouldn't allow me to upload the document (I'm on a 100 Mbps WiFi connection). The app doesn't even understand that in Germany thousands separation is ‚Äò . ‚Äô and hundreds is ‚Äò , ‚Äô. Questions related to taxation are so pathetic and ambivalent, no wonder the app couldn't process anything properly. Pathetic, not recommended at all!

This is a great app and easy to use. I have never filled Tax declaration form before, but with this app it was quiet easy. Though I made mistakes and I didn't see the Addresse of my Tax office brauch, but when I contacted the Support Team they replied within 24 hours. One thing I will like to suggest is that, create corrections for uploaded yearly pay slips. I made a lot of Mistake in filling 2018/2019 payslip forms. I will recommend this app to friends & family. Kudos guys, great job.

The app was Ok but I was expecting more assistance as an expat, for deductions and expat specific points to watch out for. Given this is an English app I think the team can do a LOT more time improve both the in-app tips and also the quite limited FAQs specific to non German citizens with skilled migrant or temporary working visas.

I've been using Taxfix since 2018, and everything was great. Now they are offering a Steuerberater. Hoping that it will be more better,I tried making my taxreturn with a Steuerberater from Tax fix. Since 3.03.23 i still haven't got an answer how much will I get or do I need to pay anything. They charged my account 129 euros right away, and im still here waiting for almost 2 months. I know they have a lot " Anfrage" but thats the reason i submit it EARLIER, so i can get answers right away.

It is an easy to understand/follow app that will help you and guide you through the German tax system. It is a bit slow BUT still the user has to be careful as well when filling the cells so overal is a 4/5 app, useful, handy and easy to navigate.

Thanks alot for the great work in creating this app and making our life easier to file tax. I would have given 5star but there are few bugs I have encountered like, when I try to answer a question keyboard popsup but the question or input text stays behind the keyboard overlay.

Used the website to put it in and it told me I could get back about 3500‚Ç¨! Instead I had to pay 80‚Ç¨ to the tax office plus had to pay taxfix... I talked to the tax office and none of my study costs where on the tax declaration, I managed to manually fix it so I at least got 50‚Ç¨ back but the discrepancy is enormous and I can not recommend it at all, pretty much got scammed...

they give a selection -30‚Ç¨ automatic generation of your tax report and sent -60‚Ç¨ if you are talking with specialist If you are chosing the second option, going through all the hell of uploading documents and filling all the IDs (the app is really clunky, it hengs almost on all pages, crushes several times) at the final page where you need to write your IBAN and give them a SEPA mandat, there is written something like: Agree to give a sepa mandat to charge a minimum 60‚Ç¨ OR 20% OF THE TAX RETURN
Since I updated it today the app has become unusable. There is a lot of lag and it has become extremely slow. You click something, you hear the click and then it takes 10 seconds to go to next step

not suitable for those who have just moved to germany, because it hasn't incorporated the relevant considerations. you can only use it for the year after moving to germany, which limits the value of this app.you will need to use another tool to do tax in the first year. perhaps you can use that alternative product in the years to come, too.

Perfectly executed...no hidden areas and simple forward in German or English Tax declaration.....the cost beside is a fraction of what it really does for submit the Tax. I recommend it and will use it Years coming. Elster is Ok but this one knocks the Elster completly out of the Park ,due the platform of easiness with the same outcome.

This app is slow, bugged and support doesn't reply in time. Choose something else. Literally the word app I used, wait for 40 seconds every time I try to go to the return because their expert service doesn't understand some documents

I have used Taxfix in the past with good experience. But since the last updates, the app does not even load! I cannot access my previous filings. It is a shame how a working app was turned into a faulty one.

The German version is full of bugs, very slow, crashed when uploading documents. Also it was not possible to fill up the taxes with an expert on the browser, it was mandatory to use the phone which is total impractical.

This app used to be great, now it is no longer helpful for me to do my taxes expecially in Germany. This year I filed my taxes thru the app and it said I would get a refund, then it is automatically sent to the Finanzamt for review. Now all of a sudden I owe money! Super easy, convenient, and self-explanatory! With this app - even something as time-consuming and frustrating, as doing ones taxes - has become a joy! The support team is awesome as well! It's just a disaster, nothing else to describe this apps. I applied for my tax return, but I didn't get my money. Very good, easy to use, saves time. So far i would recommend. But am still optimistically curious about the final results, since i am waiting from the App, plus its my first time. But comparing with other platforms i have used before this was easy to use and affordable (reasonable charges in relation to the work required).

The app is very easy to use and explains in detail most of the information. I'm not giving it 5 stars though because the date format is inconsistent across the app, in some places it's dd.mm and in others it's mm.dd, which made me double or triple check every single date so that I'm sure everything is correct.

Worst experience. Taxfix calculated ‚Ç¨951 to be refunded however the Finanzamt refunded ‚Ç¨137 only. There have been no irrelevant addition to my tax declaration. Very elegant and easy to use, effortless design and user-friendly. I could do my tax declaration in only 15 minutes and send it digitally right away! Nothing comparable to the traditional submission of tax declaration per computer apps and then printing and posting. I will definitely use it again next year!

Makes filing taxes easier every year. The process is super simple and tells you where to find all the information you need. The app asked a lot of questions I wasn't totally prepared for but it saves your progress as you go so I was able to find the information I needed then return to finish the application. Would recommend this app if you're easily confused by the tax system. Very simple. Only 1 issue: can sometimes move quite slowly, so I wouldn't recommend using when you're feeling impatient.

Simple to use and effektive in filing your taxes. Does cost 40 Euros per tax year, though, which they inform you about on the last screen, and I don't know if there are comparable apps around that do the same for free...

Tried 3 times to take pictures of documents. I tried also with a support request. The all Keep going to say that documents are cutted. Documents are cutted because of the app choices when take a picture. Documents can be read well. I will Happy to change review if something will be change

I'm very satisfied with this app. it's very easy to use, with clear and simple questions, and helpful details if needed. The calculated amount of money was exactly the same which I got from the Finance office, and no copies of expenses proofs were requested as well.

I would like to change my review. In as much my initial experience wasn't too pleasant, eventually I got reached out by support and filed my taxes. I got the amount I didn't expect! It is amazing how easy it went. Once again my greatest appreciation for what you've done. Will use the app next year and recommend it to my colleagues!

Amazing app. I filed a return for first time when I used the app and received exactly the return that was calculated within 5-6 weeks. No long wait either. I was recommended a lot of other apps and sites like elster or wundertax which came with a lot of hassles but not Taxfix. I was scrolling to learn how to file voluntary tax returns in Germany as a foreign national doing PhD when I came across it. It was very easy doing so from the comfort of your home. It does take 20 minutes hardly.Thanks.

I didn't like neither the app nor the service. We did it for two years with this. For one, the estimated amount was less than the cost of the app. But who know what happened with it, as I haven't received a single penny or notification. For the other, my husband and I got 10 euros more than the cost of the app. Some sections we didn't understand, reached out to Taxfix for help, and didn't get a clear answer either. Even with two degrees, this is not for me. Update:contacting them didn't help

It is a great app in English, such a nice platform! I sent my 2020 tax declaration via Taxfix. I asked several questions from the support team. I like many features this app has most importantly the easy-to-understand information provided for each question. I would definitely use the Taxfix app in the future.I received the Bescheid from my Finanzamt in less than a month!

The worst app of all time. I think the customer service team does not even understand the question we ask. The return is very low as compared to other apps. Got extra return by going to the tax lawyer for the same year. Would not recommend anyone to use taxfix at all.

I used Taxfix for the first time and loved its English interface, making navigation and understanding steps incredibly easy. It's straightforward and user-friendly, though it gets slightly laggy with more data filled-in. Highly recommend for a hassle-free tax filing experience!

Just did my first one in about 30 minutes. Works great, although sometimes not as reaponsible, talking about the interface or action buttons. 40‚Ç¨ as final payment ias acceptable in my eyes, so I am fine with that.

This year the app is almost unusable. Extremely slow! I chose the tax advisor option and have been waiting months. I have now almost missed the legal deadline and will be fined from the tax office. I do not recommend this.
Taxfix's website is great and their services very useful, but the app just doesn't work at all. It's not even possible to log in to my account because the app always freezes on the login page.

Very intuitive and easy to use. English support is nice. Very economical to file taxes. Some spelling mistakes, which I think they will rectify. Only doubt is I dont know if the tax return they estimate is the most optimal. But for the price, the value is very good.

I have to change my review from 5 stars to 2. The app was working amazingly until last 2 updates. Now it is unusable. Each option selection takes 20 seconds to register. If it is fixed - I will change it back to 5 stars.

Overall experience is okay. However I want to mention how slow the app is. Even though it looks great, it doesn't really work that well and fast. Improvements are needed. Yet in general the app is neat and easy to use.

The app fails to deliver in one of the key features, still it is a hitü§î less competetion may be. As a user I was disaapointed that the app couldn't scan the uploaded Annual payslip (even in web) and then you have to fill everything manually.

Used the app to do my 2022. Waited a few months and contacted the tax office. They never received anything! Contacted taxfix to resolve the issue but they can't do anything. I claimed my money back but taxfix is not responsive. Avoid this app at all costs and pick another option to do your taxes.

After submitting the declaration I can not see the detailed answers anymore. Now thw finanzant asking for some proof but I can not map what they asking for with my original answers. Aside from that the app is way too slow. Edit: The support team provided the details but it takes time.

I started to use this app in 2019 and back then it was great. Now to fill a tax statement takes 1 hour if it doesnt crash. Also whenever i try to login it is also taking hours. Nowadays huge games doesnt have this loading time. Please undo what you did to this app.

This is the 3rd year to use this app,questions were straightforward and calculations were somehow accurate. This year they changed some questions which became fuzzy when answering them. They calculated a tax return over 2K. Tax office started to ask questions about my answers in the tax assess. which eventually not correct due to fuzzy questions. Final assess. from tax office is that I have to give money back! Also they requested to make advance payments in the coming years. My advice !!avoid!!

They will ripp you off badly!! I got 70‚Ç¨ back from steuererklarung , l and taxfix took from me 60‚Ç¨ for the service of an agent whom thought was included with taxfix not seeing anywhere that i jave to pay another 30‚Ç¨ for the app itself so it makes 90‚Ç¨ in total!! Stay away from this app, dont even think to try it

Great and easy to use app.. Did my 2017 and 2018 tax end of June, It took me 40 minutes to do both.. The Finanzamt took 9 weeks to reply with their calculations which was close and paid to my account in a few days.. I will use Taxfix again and tell my friends and colleagues about this easy to use service..

Update: I got my tax return so I'm changing my negative review to a positive one. However, I would still like to leave a note to the developers. You could add notifications to the users every one or two weeks to let them know how much time (on average) is left until their application is processed by the tax office. You could also tell them you'll send them a notification once it is done, because it turns out you actually do send a notification. This will keep users reassured in the process.

I filled out all tax declaration processes but at the 99 percent to complete, the app crashed. I also tries web and ios version and nothing works. It's more than a week that I requested customer service to fix the problem but nothing hear.

Easy, fast, very user-friendly. They send your application in your city where you belong, you just need to fill up questions from your paycheck slip. You need to pay 40 eur but only when you get your tax return money on account. It's totally worth it! üëå üôÇ

Everything went well except for my payslip upload information was not reading it wright, i had to redo manual. But the app is very easy to use and at the end it tells you the result before submitting the application. Keep in mind that the submission costs 34.99‚Ç¨ per tax year.

Easy to use, and fairly clear descriptions of tax-specifc contexts. The step by step process is quite easy and, as long as you are prepared with all receipts, documents, and tax-specifc info, it's a quick procedure. I prepared 3 tax returns in a bit over an hour.

I have already used it 2 times and have had no trouble. The interface is simple and easy to use. Haven't tried the tax consultants yet but might do so in the future. For now, it has made the process better, especially since I am not fluent in german yet but also as a starter in the tax declaration process.

Not working out as it should be. Everytime when it comes to 'book and pay' it's sayin 'Not possible. Try again.' I checked all my Infos a lot of times reinstalled the App but naah still not working. Frustrating. I'd rate with 0 Stars tbh..

Super slow, non functional App at all. Emails and Support requests aren't answered. The Tax advisor never reached out about my tax return, almost 2 months now since starting the process!! I don't recommend Taxfix services and App at all!

A very helpful app for tax refund for not-native-german speakers. I speak a little german but not so good to be able to fill a tax refund and this app is really my only option. So far for me it worked quite well and I'm satisfied :)

As an expat in Germany I highly recommend this app. This is beyond just an app. I could easily fill up my tax declaration forms which should have taken forever if I wanted to do by myself. I had a very professional and responsible support from Taxfix company via Phone or Email. Comparing the fee payment to use this app with other ways for Tax declaration, it is really worth it.

Amazing customer care service! I used them to submit my tax statement, and then there were some missunderstandings with it when it was reviewed by the tax authorities. The team at Taxfix was incredibly fast to help me understand what the issue is and processed the refund immediately. I have had several bad experiences lately on different platforms and this time i was very pleasantly surprised by their processes and customer care focus. Strongly recommended!

What is the necessity of using this application when I can accomplish all tasks online? Moreover, every time I attempt to file my tax return, it notifies me that I do not possess the most recent version, even after reinstalling and updating the application. I will be switching services because I can't file my taxes.

Used it for the first time! The app is Easy to understand and user friendly. It was helpful to file the tax because the questions were in English language. Convenient app. The submission worked out, and the estimate of tax return was accurate to a couple of euros. I still spent about 2 hours filling the form, but that's just die to lack of experience: ELSTER didn't work for me at all. :) Thanks!

This app was both my best app experience and tax filing experience. Was really fast (although a bit longer than they claim, but thats OK), easy, and intuitive, in English (not always easy being a foreigner in Germany), and most importantly I got 50% more tax returns than last year (using another website). Many thanks to this company.

Super easy to use and reliable but the automatic loading of the date was not super accurate. Tried one year later and this error was fixed and is very accurate now and I give 5 stars also for the improving that I see in the app.

So far so good, waiting for the feedback from the tax office ;) Overall great UX experience and simple flow. Only the business travel section is worded a bit confusing (you get asked how many countries/places you've visited vs. how many trips you've made). Thanks for taking the pain out of filing taxes :)

I like it but I am hesitant now with the strange price increases. From 35 to 40 and, this year 60‚Ç¨ (submission for two) why? I don't see any improvement in the process and it is more expensive than other competitors now. I think I will try another service this year. Pity.

Might work if you have an extremely simple tax situation, but they obviously take a cookie-cutter approach to the tax declarations and just want to pocket their flat fee, after which they assume no responsibility for your dealings with the Finanzamt. The app is glitchy, much of the text in the app is written in an imprecise manner as if translated into English by Google Translate, some statements they make are outright false, and customer support is non-existent. Doesn't let me sign in, even after entering the verification code over and over again... Even on the website, it takes eternity to load... It was the first app to help you file taxes in Germany, but now, it's the worst app ever... It isn't even worth 1 star... I would give it a half star... shame...

I‚Äôve been using them for few years and they have made my international life in Germany so much easier given I can safely file my taxes in English and know that I am not missing anything important that would get me in trouble. I would and have recommended this service to any newcomers!

DO NOT use this app. I spent days in filling up all data, and on the last step the app just stopped working. I tried reinstalling the app, as well as the web version on a computer, but still cannot review the final return, or submit it. The customer service does not respond. Stay away!

Sometimes abit slow, I appreciate I can use it in English, abit frustrating when putting dates in its only date and month and not year aswell. Otherwise not a bad experience, will wait and see what happens with my return as its my first time doing this in germany.

Stay away from this app if you don't want to end up doing financial and legal communication with local Finanzampt with 0 support from TaxFix reading bunch of papers in German using Google Translate, even though everything was because of TaxFix's extremely misleading and wrong tooltips on their website!!!
I used to love the app but with the new update it is incredibly slow,it takes forever to load and constantly crashes. I will surely not use taxifix next year again, really not worth the money.

It's my first time filling a tax return in Germany and being a foreigner this seemed like quite a daunting experience... Taxfix was super easy to use and fill in :) All there is left to see is if their estimate is accurate.

UI is not responding and blocking to file returns. I have tested on iPhone and also in Samsung. Faced the same problem. I don't want to move to steuergo or wundertax but facing these issues from quite some time, wanted to have solution here !

L'app √® molto chiara e si spiega da s√©. Il loro servizio per rispondere √® altamente apprezzabile. Hanno fatto il mio 730 in un giorno. They did my 730 in a day. They respond to your emails very quickly. i would recommend this app to everyone.
I'm sorry but the app is now riddled with bugs. Did no one test this properly? Even if you had a decent automation in place you could spot the issues yourself. The UX is frustrating as hell.
Its super slow and lots of bugs. Every time starts from the beginning if you change any information in between. Moreover it cannot calculate the exact amount.

Great app, great support service. I used this app last year to do my Tax declaration for the previous 4 years, worked perfectly. I'm still gonna use the App this year too, hope I get something back üòÅ I surely recommend the App, It absolutely deserves a try.

Just installed it and it goes straight to a "Please update the app" screen. After taping "Update" I'm redirected to Google Play, where there are no visible Updates available for the app. Surprise, after using "Open" from Google Play, the "Please update the app" screen loads again...

My first time using this app and I must say that it is great. It saves me the time of booking an appointment with a tax expert - most of whom claimed they have been booked already for the year hence cannot attend to me - a friend recommended this app and the rest is history. I recommend it to everyone filing for tax return. Great!
Easy to use. Gives useful guidance whenever I was unsure of a question. Have already filed my taxes for 3 different years and plan to keep using it. I think it's the price. I would recommend it

Till 2020, they used to have an amazing, swift, and efficient support team, who truly understands support requests and answers directly and promptly. But now they divided their support into 2 classes: For 40 ‚Ç¨ I just got general disclaimers and repetitions of what is already published on their FAQs and forums! Relying on this team costed me over 500 ‚Ç¨ from my last tax return because they stalled until I missed my dispute submission window. I haven't tried the 130 ‚Ç¨ option.

I like it so much. The process of collection of data and calculation of the the tax free outcomes is amazing. But if it includes another aditional languages, it was useful for all people including foreigners. But the other feuture is perfect.

This is by far the app I would recommend to any working expat coming Germany like me but also locals. Super easy for the end user and fast process as I did my first tax declaration in less than an hour. To be fair I decided to expect first the response of the tax office to rate the app. So after 4 weeks I am happily surprised that I have an even higher return than what Taxfix calculated for me. Overall great customer experience and value for money

PS: edit on 03.09 I can't even login anymore after your updates, the endless circle of loading just doesn't stop. And for that experience you charge 50 Euros? I'm surprised to say that... But even German official tool is now more responsive then your app. Original review: This is the must have app for both Germans and foreigners

Though it was not reading the uploaded documents correctly, it is still good to use. Vorauszahlungen cannot be entered but taxoffice knows it. everything else is good. The steps are very lengthy but i think it is required for tax filing.

Very useful app. It makes tax declaration like a game. It takes about 30 minutes to submit your tax declaration. I need also to say thanks to the support department, because they helped me a lot, not only to complete the identification process in just a few minutes, but they also delivered the tax declaration to the tax office the same day, because I told them that I needed to meet the deadline. 5 stars for sure.

The app is crashing when accepting the 2023 tax return. I also got the email notification saying to update the app in the Play Store, but no new version is available in the Play Store, and my app is already up-to-date. Please fix the issue asap.

UPD: the app support contacted me and offered to check my declaration. Possibly this is an error on the side of tax authorities. will update later. Original review: The app estimated that I will get back around ‚Ç¨800. In reality, tax authorities asked me to PAY ‚Ç¨300. So something went wrong in the app calculations apparently. The app itself is ok.
Good overall experience. However, if you are trying to upload a file, and the file has a space, like in "payslip 2022.pdf", it will not work. The file should be named "payslip2022.pdf".
Super comfortable and easy to fill up. Very much user friendly and explanatory. And the best part is that it's in English so it helps to not feel completely lost in the German bureacracy.

Worst app for taxes! Estimated to get about 1200 euros back, got an email from tax fix saying: you are getting 1000 euros back. Got the letter from Finanzamt and I ended up paying 7 euros to the Finanzamt. I even had to pay for such a bad service!!!!
Well structured and comprehensive, very convenient

Easy to use but taxes by nature is complicated. I'm glad i kept a lot of records otherwise how can i remember the costs? And of course if there had been house moving and job shift, the filing requires more steps. Thanks taxfix!

I would not recommend anyone to use the apps for your "Steuererkl√§rung ". This app doesn't calculate it well and gives you incorrect information about your income on how much you should receive back from the state. It's just a waste of time.

The process generally works well and is great resource for those who are unfamiliar with German tax declarations. Negatives: - Some mistakes in the English translation, be careful. - referral promotions from housemate didn't work (only apparent right at the end of process) and customer support were unwilling to help - Taxfix refuse to give a copy of answers you gave.
